item.title: [zz]Oracle's Java patch contains new holes, researchers warn
item.description: Oracle’s Java patch contains new holes, researchers warnLucian ConstantinJan 19, 2013 11:17 AMprintResearchers from Security Explorations, a Poland-based vulnerability research firm, claim to have found two new vulnerabilities in Java 7 Update 11 that can be exploited to bypass the software’s security sandbox and execute arbitrary code on computers.Oracle released Java 7 Update 11 last Sunday as an emergency security update in order to block a zero-day exploit used by cybercriminals to infect computers with malware.
